name: Webpack
description: A powerful bundler and build tool for JavaScript applications, supporting code splitting and various loaders.

name: React
description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces, focusing on component-based architecture.

name: Angular
description: A comprehensive JavaScript framework for building dynamic single-page applications, using TypeScript as its main language.

name: Vue
description: A progressive JavaScript framework for building user interfaces, with a focus on ease of integration and flexibility.

name: Node.js
description: A JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine, designed for server-side and networking applications.

name: Gulp
description: A task automation tool for JavaScript developers, designed to automate repetitive tasks such as minification, compilation, and testing.

name: Grunt
description: A JavaScript task runner, providing a wide ecosystem of plugins for automating workflows.

name: Express
description: A minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework, providing robust features for building web and mobile applications.

name: Next.js
description: A React framework for building server-side rendered and static web applications with ease.

name: Svelte
description: A new approach to building user interfaces, where the framework compiles your code to highly optimized vanilla JavaScript at build time.
